ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+
ygData.msgSnippet: It s pretty easy with  help. We did it with 2 druids and a warrior. ... From: Su To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Tuesday, July 30, 2002 12:05 PM Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
It's pretty easy with  help. We did it with 2 druids and a warrior.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, July 30, 2002 12:05 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+

Ah. ok. I need to get the seb key..
luv,
-Su


OS is  Old Sebilis.
  ----- Original Message -----
  From: Su
  To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Monday, July 29, 2002 3:23 PM
  Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+


  I'm blanking on OS. What is OS?
  KC might be a good idea. Thanks!
  Speaking of jaggedpine I had someone beg me to come to Qeynos Hills with
  them to rez a bunch of people who were killed in some sort of GM event.
all
  kinds of npcs were in front of surefall glade. I hung out and rezzed
people
  then after waiting and finding they might not be able to make it happen
  again for another hour or more I decided to head out and get some sleep.
  Was anyone around for an event of that type in Qhills?
  luv,
  -Su

  Only 2 places like that are Vox's lair (only inside it where she is, NOT
  the rest of the zone) and Naggy's lair (same thing). Any OTHER part of the
  zone is 100% normal for all levels, and can be gone into. As for exp...try
  Karnor's and  OS. Jaggedpine might be a good bet too.
    ----- Original Message -----
    From: Su
    To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
    Sent: Sunday, July 28, 2002 12:38 PM
    Subject: [EverQuest] Hunting grounds for 50+


    Ok now that my cleric is lvl 52, I'm trying to find a good place to hunt
  to
    get xp. Also, are there any parts of my epic that I can do out of order.
    Like can I kill some mob in nagafen's lair or such without doing the
other
    parts first? Or does the king something or other.. whatever it is
there..
    does it have to be triggered by the quest to spawn? I'm worried that I
  will
    hit one of those zones where if you are over 52 you will be banished to
  zone
    beginning so I want to do what I can while lower lvl and then do the
  higher
    lvl stuff once I've gone up more.
    Any suggestions?
    luv,
    -Su
